text: Over the Limit (2010) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on May 23, 2010 at the Joe Louis Arena in Detroit, Michigan. It was the first Over the Limit event held by WWE and replaced Judgment Day in the May PPV slot. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Montel Vontavious Porter defeated Chavo Guerrero Singles match 4:20 2 Kofi Kingston defeated Drew McIntyre (c) Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 6:24 3 R-Truth defeated Ted DiBiase (with Virgil) Singles match 7:46 4 Rey Mysterio defeated CM Punk Straight Edge Society pledge vs. Hair match 13:49 5 The Hart Dynasty (David Hart Smith and Tyson Kidd) (with Natalya) (c) defeated Chris Jericho and The Miz Tag team match for the Unified WWE Tag Team Championship 10:44 6 Edge vs. Randy Orton ended in a double countout Singles match 12:58 7 Big Show defeated Jack Swagger (c) by disqualification Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 5:05 8 Eve (c) defeated Maryse Singles match for the WWE Divas Championship 5:03 9 John Cena (c) defeated Batista "I Quit" match for the WWE Championship 20:33 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Over the Limit 2010 website Category:2010 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Detroit Category:WWE Over the Limit Category:2010 in the United States Category:2010s in Detroit
title: Over the Limit (2010)
